CREATE_TABLE: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS users (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, email TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE, password TEXT NOT NULL, role_id INTEGER, name TEXT NOT NULL, created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updated_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
INSERT: INSERT INTO users (email, password, role_id, name, created_at, updated_at) VALUES ($email, $password, $role_id, $name, $created_at, $updated_at)
UPDATE: UPDATE users SET email = $email, password = $password, role_id = $role_id, name = $name, updated_at = $updated_at WHERE id = $id
